raw_body:
ENOCH – DAPHNE – Beloved wife of late Albert Enoch,​ loving mother of Royston,​ Stewert,​ Trionne,​ Yvonne (Lucky),​ Darrel & Lilian (Lily),​ loving mother-in-law of Srimathi,​ Thilani,​ Nihal,​ Mark,​ Jaya & Mario,​ loving grandmother of Petula,​ Amanda,​ Manoj,​ Rosandra,​ Natasha & Neosha,​ loving great grandmother of Senuli,​ Vinuli,​ Nathan,​ Amelia & Evelyn,​ expired. Remains will be at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour,​ Kalubowila,​ from 15th February from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. Cortege leaves for Burial at Kohuwela Cemetery,​ “Nisala Arana” on 16th February at 3 p.m. (No flowers on request).
011128
